bibl.title: The Augustan Era in Egypt. A Note on P. Oxy. XII. 1453.
bibl.note: Suggests to read the date in line 20 as Mesore 7: the second year of Augustus would have begun on Mesore 8. It seems possible that, initially at least, his rule was regarded as commencing on Mesore 8, the anniversary of the date of the capture of Alexandria.
bibl.seg: Skeat T.C., The Augustan Era in Egypt. A Note on P. Oxy. XII. 1453.

Suggests to read the date in line 20 as Mesore 7: the second year of Augustus would have begun on Mesore 8. It seems possible that, initially at least, his rule was regarded as commencing on Mesore 8, the anniversary of the date of the capture of Alexandria.
